__e: She's too weak to be removed, except to a hospital.
She may now be weaker and even be...
For he is strong, and I am weak and am not--
Well, my penning is bad, my ink is pale, my love for you will never fail.
My will is weak and my resolve strong where you're concerned.
-She's weak, but that's to be expected.
I'm the weakest of us all.
I'm so weak from hunger I couldn't even kick sand in your face, motherfucker.
I may be feeble in body but not in mind.
But they are poor eyes to read God's word.
I don't think you're so terribly to be pitied.
I'm glad you said it, because I've been too weak to say it myself.
I don't know if it was the dim light... or the clanging sound of your empty lunch box... hanging from your baseball bat... that makes me remember everything so clearly.
The current is weak or the furnace is not running.
How is she, languid or not?
